content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
This is old news, but not properly announced yet: I still need to get used to
it myself.

Current Isabelle/342362c9496c provides Admin/init to manage a repository clone
with components etc. Details are explained in README_REPOSITORY or "Admin/init
-?".

The most common form is probably:

Admin/init -u

Makarius

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
